meanings.definition: A smaller division or part of a larger zone or area.
meanings.sent1: The park had a designated subzone for picnics.
meanings.sent2: The city was divided into several subzones for better organization.
meanings.sent3: In the subzone for pets, only dogs were allowed to play.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a subzone, each thought a separate area.
meanings.sent5: The subzone for flowers was bursting with colorful blooms.

meanings.definition: To divide or classify into smaller zones or areas.
meanings.sent1: The urban planner decided to subzone the residential area for better planning.
meanings.sent2: They subzoned the land into commercial and residential areas.
meanings.sent3: She subzoned her closet into sections for different types of clothes.
meanings.sent4: His brain automatically subzoned the information into categories.
meanings.sent5: The teacher subzoned the classroom for group activities.
